_source.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
_source.long_desc: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.
_source.target_audience: Engineering teams, Support Teams, System Administrators, NOC teams at any scale -- from startups to Fortune 500 companies.

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Download free IT help desk software for IT pros & sysadmins around the world in all businesses. Support & mobile apps also free.
related_products.features: The Spiceworks IT Help Desk is purpose-built for IT pros, we have just what you need to run a better internal IT help desk and a better business. Start tackling tickets in minutes with free help desk software (on your server or in the cloud). Plus, it's more than just ticket tracking: understand (and change!) team behavior and articulate your value to the business. Get it free today!

related_products.short_desc: Aha! is the world's #1 product development software - trusted by 600,000+ product builders from companies of all sizes.
related_products.features: Aha! is the world's #1 product development software. Our suite of tools works seamlessly together to help teams turn raw concepts into valuable new capabilities - for customers and the business. Set strategy, crowdsource ideas, spark creativity, prioritize features, share roadmaps, manage releases, and plan development.

related_products.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
related_products.features: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway is the most advanced and flexible system in the industry for managing and monitoring your applications.
related_products.features: Pulseway is the ultimate application performance management software and is the most advanced and flexible system in the industry for managing and monitoring your applications and systems.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

related_products.short_desc: Datadog APM offers end-to-end distributed tracing and APM at scale, correlated to all telemetry. No sampling, no blindspots, no limits.
related_products.features: Datadog Application Performance Monitoring provides end-to-end distributed tracing from frontend devices to databases-with no sampling. By seamlessly correlating distributed traces with frontend and backend data, Datadog APM enables you to monitor service dependencies, reduce latency, and eliminate errors so that your users get the best possible experience.

related_products.short_desc: Our APM tools help our 1300+ customers spend less time fighting technology and more time releasing it.
related_products.features: We built a set of APM tools to tell us how, and why, applications fail. From pre-production to deployment, when our 1300+ customers spend less time fighting technology they spend more time releasing it, and those new applications make the world a better place for all of us.

related_products.short_desc: End-to-end observability for enterprise IT and MSPs. LogicMonitor's fully-automated monitoring platform is cloud-first and hybrid ready
related_products.features: LogicMonitor's SaaS-based observability and IT operations data collaboration platform helps ITOps, developers, MSPs and business leaders gain visibility into and predictability across the technologies that modern organizations depend on to deliver extraordinary employee and customer experiences. LogicMonitor seamlessly monitors everything from networks to applications to the cloud, empowering companies to focus less on troubleshooting and more on innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Ensure your mission-critical business applications meet end-user expectations with 360-degree monitoring from Applications Manager.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine Applications Manager provides deep-dive performance monitoring for 130+ technologies spanning physical, virtual, and cloud environments. Additionally, it tracks the end-user experience of web applications running on Java, .NET, Ruby on Rails, .NET core, Node.js and PHP platforms. More than 5000 businesses around the world use Applications Manager to quickly detect, isolate and resolve performance issues, effectively plan capacity and ensure optimal performance of their applications.

similar_products.short_desc: Atlassian Open DevOps is mission control, providing the flexibility of a custom toolchain with the coordination of an all-in-one.
similar_products.features:
Open DevOps is Atlassian's DevOps solution, powered by the integration of Jira Software and your team's favorite tools. By connecting seemingly disparate tools, Jira Software becomes mission control for your software toolchain, giving teams the flexibility of a custom toolchain with the coordination of an all-in-one.

Atlassian's open approach empowers you to custom tailor your DevOps toolchain to the exact needs of your team because DevOps can't be bought from a single vendor, it's built.

similar_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
similar_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: SolarWinds? AppOptics helps provides powerful infrastructure and application performance monitoring across all layers of the stack.
similar_products.features: A simple, powerful, & affordable software as a service (SaaS)-based infrastructure & application monitoring tool for custom on-premises, cloud, and hybrid systems. By enabling quick identification of performance problems across the stackfrom the application to the underlying infrastructure & even down to the line of codeAppOptics helps reduce mean time to resolution (MTTR). AppOptics enables you to align infrastructure & application performance objectives side by side with business objectives.

similar_products.short_desc: Site24x7 APM help you track the performance of your applications across different platforms such as Java, .NET, PHP, Ruby, & Node.js.
similar_products.features: Monitor your entire application stack from URL's to databases with complete visibilty with Site24x7 APM Insight. Site24x7 APM Insight allows you to track every transaction that happens and allows you to optimize them before your end users are affected. With application performance monitoring, you can track exceptions as they occur and get a detailed overview of root cause of the problem.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

similar_products.short_desc: AlertBot is a leading provider of advanced website and performance monitoring for companies of all sizes.
similar_products.features: AlertBot provides advanced website and performance monitoring for companies of all sizes. We use real web browsers when testing your pages and critical applications from locations throughout the world including login areas, sign-up forms, shopping carts, file downloads, control panels, mobile applications and much more. AlertBot will alert your team of website errors, slowness issues, and unresponsive behavior within minutes of it happening via email, text message and automated phone calls.

similar_products.short_desc: A metrics & analytics solution for effective DevOps Value Stream Metrics that empowers teams to deliver software better.
similar_products.features: Plandek is a leading metrics & analytics solution for businesses that deliver software in all industries. By providing an end-to-end view of the software delivery process, it allows engineering teams to become significantly more effective. By introducing Plandek DevOps Value Stream Metrics, organisations can improve delivery effectiveness, and ultimately build software better.

similar_products.short_desc: RevDeBug is a reverse debugging solution offering the Record and Replay technology that will change the way you fix code.
similar_products.features:
RevDeBug is a reverse debugging solution that can record the state for each line of code and provides easy access to all historical values of variables. It traces root causes of errors, by stepping back in time, eliminating the need to continuously restart debugging session.

RevDeBug is well suited to run on production environments, eliminating the process of bug behaviour replication, saving time for Q&A & customer support and for developers.

similar_products.short_desc: The smarter way to embrace continuous change across your applications and digital workspaces - cloud, virtual and physical.
similar_products.features: The Login Enterprise platform is the industry's first digital workspace reliability platform that preserves the performance of Windows applications and workspaces (cloud, virtual and physical). It provides a human-centric and automated approach that objectively measures experience and delivers immediate and actionable insights into the impact of any change. Organizations can plan and maintain a successful digital workplace with less cost, fewer disruptions, and less risk.

similar_products.short_desc: Stop using API gateways and clouds for API performance and error tracking. Easily see and find all of it with Treblle.
similar_products.features:
Main features include:
API observability, real-time API monitoring, auto-generated documentation, request sharing, 1 click testing, powerful filtering and analytics, error tracking.

Integrate and start using in under 5 minutes with an easy-to-understand Dashboard. No extensive onboarding is required. 

Try it out with our free forever plan!

similar_products.short_desc: Pulseway is the most advanced and flexible system in the industry for managing and monitoring your applications.
similar_products.features: Pulseway is the ultimate application performance management software and is the most advanced and flexible system in the industry for managing and monitoring your applications and systems.

similar_products.short_desc: AimBetter is  Database Monitor & Application Performance Management service, which makes critical applications to run faster.
similar_products.features:
AimBetter is a database monitoring and application performance management service. The cloud-based solution pinpoints the exact sources of SQL server & application performance problems and sends alerts in real-time, enabling rapid problem identification. AimBetter DBA and NOC teams make recommendations to boost performance and maintain databases efficiently, ensuring that IT departments stay in control, while saving money.
We provide end-to-end DBA services from problem detection through fixing

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Development software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Development tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Development software assists developers with the deployment of software applications. Application Development solutions aid in the creation of custom solutions for an organization's technology and information infrastructure. Typically, application development software is geared to work with a variety of common programming languages and platforms. Application Development software is related to Bug Tracking software and License Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Database Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Monitoring software helps organizations to track, optimize and diagnose performance of their database applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Lifecycle Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Lifecycle Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software integrates each of the processes required to design, build, deploy and maintain products. Organizations use PLM applications to reduce the time and expenses associated with the development, manufacturing and repair or upgrade of their products. Product Lifecycle Management solutions aid in identifying and implementing cost-saving changes to the manufacturing processes, optimizing design engineering and centralizing supplier and part inventory data. Product Lifecycle Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, MRP software and Quality Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top SaaS Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of SaaS Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: SaaS Management software provides centralized monitoring and management of dispersed SaaS applications across the organization, as well as tracking and control of SaaS subscriptions and all associated costs.

category_features.name: Bandwidth Monitoring
category_features.definition: Measure the actual bandwidth available on a local network (LAN or WiFi)

category_features.name: Baseline Manager
category_features.definition: Define network parameters and threshold settings to monitor network health and take necessary precautions

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: Provide insights on the network's performance and health on a continuous real-time basis

category_features.name: IP Address Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the IP addresses of the incoming traffic

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the amount of internet bandwidth and speed utilized  each resource in a shared network

category_features.name: Network Analysis
category_features.definition: Run tests on the network to find the root cause of the network issues

category_features.name: Network Resource Management
category_features.definition: Manage efficient and effective use of network resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Track current service level agreements based on quantifiable metrics

category_features.name: Uptime Reporting
category_features.definition: Track the time for which a designated network or a website is available to the users over a given period of time

category_features.name: Web Traffic Reporting
category_features.definition: Keep track of the amount of data sent and received  the visitors to a website

category_features.name: Audit Management
category_features.definition: Plan, schedule and execute organization's accounts and assets to ensure they all comply with policies, laws, and requirements.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Cost Tracking
category_features.definition: Record and monitor cost related information of assets (i.e. budget for assets, equipment costs, revenues, etc.)

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Maintenance Management
category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.name: Procurement Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage all processes/procedures involved in purchasing goods and/or services

category_features.name: Requisition Management
category_features.definition: Review, approve and cancel requests for goods/services to be purchased

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipments, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Availability Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and analyze availability issues to help design and plan the improvement of service availability

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Problem Management
category_features.definition: Identify and solve underlying cause of incident(s), and prevent future incidents from occurring

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Release Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate the testing/deployment of IT service releases (i.e. service changes)

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Create a targeted plan, schedule resources, and determine long-term goals for the audit process

category_features.name: Corrective and Preventive Actions (CAPA)
category_features.definition: Investigate and take action at root cause or error in products/processes to prevent recurrence of the same error

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: IT Incident Management
category_features.definition: Manage incidents related to outages or breaches in functionality of IT systems

category_features.name: Incident Reporting
category_features.definition: Report and update incidents that occur on a job or en route to a job site

category_features.name: Investigation Management
category_features.definition: Oversee people and resources to carry out an investigation

category_features.name: OSHA Compliance
category_features.definition: Guidelines set by Occupational Safety and Health Administration regarding record keeping

category_features.name: Safety Incident Management
category_features.definition: Track, report on and implement actions pertaining to physical safety at the workplace

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and report regulatory data to either internal management or external stakeholders

category_features.name: Data Visualization
category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.name: Event Logs
category_features.definition: A record of actions or occurrences recognized by software

category_features.name: Log Collection
category_features.definition: Collects and aggregates data from various systems within the IT environment

category_features.name: Remediation Management
category_features.definition: Identify and orchestrate execution of actions needed to restore systems to optimal conditions

category_features.name: Server Logs
category_features.definition: Log files automatically created for all activities performed by servers, such as a history of web page requests

category_features.name: Threshold Alerts
category_features.definition: Alerts/notification for when traffic utilization or network performance deviates from pre-defined threshold settings

category_features.name: CPU Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor performance details involving CPU/memory utilization

category_features.name: Credential Management
category_features.definition: Change passwords so that the locally stored password on the client can be updated at the same time it is modified on the server

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.definition: A record of actions or occurrences recognized by software

category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Virtual Machine Monitoring
category_features.definition: Manages the operation of virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine

category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.definition: Track system's health and performance continuously with information and updates being available instantly at any point in time

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Performance Management software manages and measures application performance levels and status, enabling accurate, real-time observations of system health and capacity. Organizations use the sophisticated diagnostic tools provided by Application Performance Management software to make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Application Performance Management software is related to Network Monitoring software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Computer Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Computer Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Center Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Center Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Center Management software allows users to monitor and control all connected networks and devices across an entire organization. This type of software allows for application delivery, trouble shooting, and reporting across the organizational network. Data Center Management software is related to IT Asset Management software, Data Storage software, Database Management software, Network Monitoring software, and Network Security software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Monitoring software helps organizations to track, optimize and diagnose performance of their database applications.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Endpoint Detection And Response (EDR) software helps organizations protect their networks from malicious software that can enter the system via endpoint devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.
